str2: Pilate. Of Latin origin; close-pressed, i.e. Firm; Pilatus, a Roman.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To decree, give sentence, decide. From epi and krino; to adjudge.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A petition, request. From aiteo; a thing asked or an asking.
A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
